_Definition: The details of the child application on the case

Label: To make an application not shown on this list, you'll need to submit a paper application to the court.
What type of applications do you want to make?
_Definition: Type of the child application on the case

Label: Has the respondent agreed to the order that you want the judge to make?
_Definition: The details of the child application on the case related to respondent agreement

Label:
## Statement of truth
I understand that proceedings for contempt of court may be brought against anyone who makes, or causes to be made, a false statement in a document verified by a statement of truth without an honest belief in its truth.

Comment: This field is used to capture information and is then cleared immediately. Required to reset SoT when user changes answer in CYA

Label: Is this an urgent application?
_Definition: This fields holds whether or not the application is urgent, and if it is then the further details and reasons

Label: Do you want the court to inform the other party of this application?
_Definition: This fields holds whether or not the other party should be notified of this application. If no, then reasons behind not notifying.

Label: What order do you want the court to make?
HintText: This is the draft order that you are requesting from the court

Label:
## Upload any evidence that supports your application (optional) 
* files must be no more than 100MB in size 
* you can upload jpg.png.svg.gif.doc and PDF files 
* before uploading a file, give it a meaningful name. For example claimnumber.document-type.doc

_Definition: The details of the child application on the case

Label: Pay for application with PBA
_Definition: This fields holds applicant's PBA details.
